description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Order to approve the acquisition of immovable properties in Kongala, Hakmana D/S Division, Matara District for the construction under Hakmana Water Supply Scheme in Hanwellagama, Badulla D/S Division, Badulla District for the constructions under Badulla Urban Wastewater and Sewerage Project in Hokandara North, Kaduwela D/S Division, Colombo District for the constructions under Weliwita Water Supply Scheme in Naiwala, Minuwangoda D/S Division, Gampaha District for the constructions under Gampaha, Attanagalla and Minuwangoda Integrated Water Supply Scheme
